verses.1: Topa in ka to kumpipa tungah, “Na galte nangma khengakna-in ka bawl matengin ka tak lamah tu in,” a ci hi.
verses.2: Topa in Zion panin na kumpi ciangkhut hong puak hi. Na galteʼ tungah uk in.
verses.3: Nangma mihonte mual siangtho tungah na makaih ciangin, utna lungsim tawh na mite hong kipia ding uh hi. Daitui bangin zingsangin na khangnona nangma tungah hong tung ding hi.
verses.4: Topa in thu ciam zo a, ama ngaihsutna kheel lo ding hi. “Melkhizedek bangin a tawntungin siampi na hi hi,” a ci hi.
verses.5: Nangma tak lamah Topa hong om a, ama heh ni-in kumpite a zo gawp ding hi.
verses.6: Kumpipa in minamte lakah thu khen dinga, tua munte si luanghawm tawh a dimsak ding hi. Amah in a zai mahmah leitungah ukpite a susia ding hi.
verses.7: Amah in lampi gei-a om luitui dawn dinga, amah a tha hatin a gualzo pa hi ding hi.
